job_description:
Business Development Executive

Company: 2Base Technologies

We are seeking a high-performing, self-driven Senior Business Development Executive to join our team. In this role, you will drive revenue by generating leads, building client relationships, and managing the full sales cycle for IT services and digital solutions. If you thrive in a consultative sales environment with a passion for technology and business growth, this is your opportunity!

Responsibilities - Identify and generate qualified leads via outbound channels, referrals, and market research. - Drive new business opportunities for web, mobile, and enterprise software development services. - Manage the complete sales cycle: lead qualification, client communication, requirement analysis, proposal preparation, pricing, negotiation, and closure. - Propose tailored IT/digital transformation solutions aligned with client business objectives. - Build relationships with Founders, CXOs, and Product Owners. - Collaborate with delivery, design, and marketing teams to craft proposals and presentations. - Maintain CRM records and provide sales forecasts/reports. - Represent the company at networking events and client meetings. - Meet/exceed monthly/quarterly revenue targets.

Requirements - Bachelor’s degree or equivalent in education/experience (BSc IT/CS, BCA, B-Tech IT/CS/EC, MBA, CS/IT Diploma). - 2-5 years of B2B sales experience in IT/digital solutions. - Proven ability to manage sales pipelines and close deals independently. - Strong knowledge of software development services (web/mobile apps, SaaS, enterprise solutions). - Experience with international clients preferred. - Proficiency in CRM tools (Zoho, HubSpot, Salesforce) and outbound sales tools (LinkedIn Sales Navigator). - Excellent communication, negotiation, and presentation skills. - Ability to work autonomously with ownership of sales targets. - Strategic thinking to address client pain points and position solutions.

Contact: Share your resume at careers@2basetechnologies.com.
summary: Senior Business Development Executive driving IT services sales, managing end-to-end sales cycle, and building client relationships. Requires 2-5 years B2B sales experience, CRM proficiency, and tech industry knowledge.

job_description:
Business Analyst

The Business Analyst plays a key role in ensuring requirements are clearly understood, accurately documented, and traceable throughout the software development lifecycle. This role focuses on translating business and functional inputs into structured, standardized documentation that supports effective development, testing, and delivery. Working closely with business analysts, design teams, and technical stakeholders, the role ensures consistency, clarity, and alignment across all requirement artifacts.

Key Responsibilities

  • Create Software Requirement Specifications (SRS) based on inputs from Core Business Analysts, stakeholder discussions, and requirement walkthroughs
  • Prepare Business Requirement Documents (BRD) using approved templates while ensuring business intent and system behavior are clearly documented
  • Participate in requirement discussions to understand business objectives, functional flows, dependencies, and assumptions before documentation
  • Analyze requirements to identify gaps, ambiguities, and inconsistencies, and work with Core BAs to resolve them
  • Document functional flows, business rules, and acceptance criteria where applicable to support development and QA teams
  • Document wireframes, UI flows, validations, and UI specifications in collaboration with design and product teams
  • Maintain change logs, version history, and document updates throughout the project lifecycle
  • Create and manage traceability matrices linking business, functional, and technical requirements
  • Maintain cross-references across BRD, SRS, UI, API, and related documentation
  • Ensure documentation consistency, completeness, and alignment with approved scope and delivery timelines
  • Ensure accurate and timely PMS updates with structured documentation details
  • Support development, QA, UAT, and audit processes through clear, traceable, and up-to-date documentation
  • Assist in requirement reviews, walkthroughs, and validation sessions with internal and client stakeholders

Requirements

Required Skills and Experience

  • 1 to 4 years of experience in Business Analysis documentation or related roles
  • Strong experience in BRD and SRS creation
  • Hands-on experience with documentation templates, standards, and version control
  • Ability to document UI wireframes and functional flows clearly
  • Working knowledge of APIs and system integrations for documentation purposes
  • Experience with project management systems and documentation tools
  • Strong attention to detail and ability to manage multiple documents in parallel
  • Excellent written communication and stakeholder coordination skills

Minimum Qualifications

  • Bachelor’s degree in Engineering, Computer Science, Information Systems, or a related field
  • 1 to 4 years of experience as a Business Analyst or Product Analyst

Benefits

  • A growth-driven environment with opportunities to lead, innovate, and upskill continuously.

If this opportunity aligns with your career goals, kindly share your updated resume with us at careers@2basetechnologies.com
summary: Translates business requirements into structured documentation for software development. Ensures clarity, traceability, and alignment across teams.

job_description:
Senior Business Analyst

At 2Base, we are rebuilding the Business Analyst function into a world-class, product-minded, clarity-driven team. This role is not a documentation role, not a screen updater role, and not a support role. This is a core Business Analyst position responsible for functional modeling, system reasoning, requirement clarity, and building the foundation for correct development.

Key Responsibilities

  • Lead requirement workshops, client calls, and discovery discussions to understand business needs clearly.
  • Ask deeper questions, challenge assumptions, and validate the true business intent behind every requirement.
  • Convert ambiguous client inputs into structured, logical, and actionable functional understanding.
  • Break large features into modules, workflows, components, and clear dependencies.
  • Build strong system-level understanding involving APIs, integrations, data flow, and backend considerations.
  • Translate business processes into functional logic that development teams can execute.
  • Decompose requirements into use-case flows, system behaviors, edge cases, alternate paths, validation rules, and dependencies.
  • Prepare high-quality documentation, including BRD, FRD, SRS, workflows, state diagrams, data-flow diagrams, API requirement specs, and acceptance criteria.
  • Ensure all documentation is clear, logical, structured, testable, and ready for developers and QA to use.
  • Collaborate closely with developers, architects, QA, and product owners to validate feasibility and align understanding.
  • Ensure QA teams can derive test cases effectively from your functional logic and acceptance criteria.
  • Communicate confidently with clients, handle requirement discussions smoothly, and clarify misunderstandings immediately.
  • Push back politely on unclear or changing requirements and ensure final decisions are documented properly.
  • Maintain requirement traceability throughout the lifecycle and ensure zero ambiguity during handover to development.
  • Own the entire requirement lifecycle from discovery to development readiness with high accountability.
  • Drive clarity across teams by ensuring every requirement is complete, validated, and logically consistent.

Required Skills & Experience

  • Minimum 4+ years of core Business Analyst experience with strong analytical and system-level thinking.
  • Ability to break down complex requirements into clear components, workflows, and functional logic.
  • Excellent verbal and written communication with confidence in client interactions and clarifications.
  • Proven experience in preparing SRS, BRD, FRD, workflows, and acceptance criteria with high clarity.
  • Ability to challenge assumptions politely, ask the right questions, and ensure zero ambiguity.
  • Strong collaboration experience with development, QA, architects, and cross-functional teams.
  • Understanding of API behaviors, integrations, data flows, and multi-module system interactions.
  • Ability to run requirement discussions, workshops, and independently lead discovery sessions.
  • Exposure to SaaS, scalable products, automation, or AI-supported systems is an added advantage.
  • Demonstrated ownership of requirements end-to-end, ensuring developer-ready and testable outputs.
  • Not suitable for UI-only thinkers, passive communicators, template-based writers, or those relying on AI for answers.
  • Success is defined by clear, testable requirements, zero rework, strong cross-team alignment, and confident communication.

Minimum Qualifications

  • Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Engineering, Business, or related field
  • 4 to 8 years of experience as a Business Analyst or Product Analyst
  • Experience in SaaS or scalable product environments
  • Exposure to AI/Automation, integrations, or multi-module systems
  • Ability to run independent client workshops
  • Must have independently handled requirement ownership for at least one full project lifecycle

Benefits

  • A growth-driven environment with opportunities to lead, innovate, and upskill continuously.

Contact: If this opportunity aligns with your career goals, kindly share your updated resume with us at careers@2basetechnologies.com.
summary: Senior Business Analyst role at 2Base focuses on functional modeling, system reasoning, and requirement clarity. Drives cross-team alignment and ensures testable, developer-ready outputs with zero rework.

job_description:
Senior DevSecOps Engineer

We are seeking a Senior DevSecOps Engineer to lead cybersecurity, infrastructure automation, and DevSecOps practices as we transition to a secure, scalable, and modern engineering environment. This role will strengthen 2Base’s security posture, modernize pipelines, and foster a secure-by-design culture.

Key Responsibilities

  • Define, implement, and enforce security standards, policies, and best practices across cloud and on-prem environments.
  • Conduct security risk assessments, vulnerability scans, penetration testing, and mitigation plans.
  • Architect and enhance secure CI/CD pipelines with automated compliance and governance checkpoints.
  • Promote a "Security First" culture, ensuring secure design and development practices.
  • Monitor, detect, investigate, and respond to security threats, incidents, breaches, and anomalies.
  • Develop Infrastructure-as-Code practices using Terraform, Ansible, and automation frameworks.
  • Design secure cloud architectures on AWS, Azure, or GCP for scalable, compliant deployments.
  • Build and secure containerized environments with Docker and Kubernetes using enforced security baselines.
  • Implement secure monitoring, logging, SIEM, and alerting systems for infrastructure and applications.
  • Improve system reliability, scalability, performance, and fault tolerance across critical workloads.
  • Mentor DevOps engineers in secure development, automation, and operational excellence.
  • Lead technical strategy, tool selection, process improvements, and DevSecOps roadmap execution.
  • Collaborate with BA, PM, and Engineering teams to align security, performance, and delivery goals.

Required Skills & Experience

  • 4–8 years in DevOps, Cloud, or Infrastructure engineering with security exposure.
  • Hands-on CI/CD tools: Jenkins, GitLab CI, GitHub Actions.
  • Strong expertise in AWS, Azure, or GCP with secure architecture focus.
  • Proficiency in Infrastructure-as-Code (Terraform, Ansible).
  • Experience securing Docker and Kubernetes environments.
  • Networking knowledge: LAN/WAN, firewalls, VPN, load balancers.
  • Familiarity with security frameworks (OWASP, NIST, CIS Benchmarks).
  • Monitoring/logging tools: Prometheus, Grafana, ELK, CloudWatch, SIEM.
  • Scripting skills: Python, Bash, Shell.
  • Excellent troubleshooting, analytical, and problem-solving abilities.
  • Strong communication and collaboration skills to influence engineering teams.

Contact: Email your resume to careers@2basetechnologies.com.
summary: Lead cybersecurity and DevSecOps practices, modernize secure pipelines, and mentor teams to ensure scalable, compliant infrastructure.

Company: Reflections Info Systems (P) Ltd Location: 9A2, Carnival Technopark, Kariyavattom P.O, Thiruvananthapuram, Kerala, India Website: www.reflectionsinfos.com Closing Date: 13, Feb 2026 Published Date: 06, Feb 2026 Contact Email: Careers@reflectionsinfos.com

Brief Description

We are seeking an experienced Cloud and Infrastructure Architect to lead enterprise-wide infrastructure strategy and implementation across public cloud platforms and on-premise data center technologies. This role requires an expert who can drive cloud adoption strategies, hybrid infrastructure design, seamless migration execution, and infrastructure security governance while aligning technical solutions with broader business and IT goals.

Responsibilities

  • Lead the development and execution of enterprise infrastructure strategies for public cloud, private cloud, and on-premise data centers.
  • Drive cloud adoption and migration programs, including assessments, migration planning, execution governance, and post-migration optimization.
  • Architect robust solutions across compute, storage, networking, virtualization, and enterprise security best standards.
  • Provide thought leadership and decision-making guidance on public cloud services, data center technologies, and emerging infrastructure trends.
  • Design and enforce strong infrastructure security practices, governance frameworks, and compliance adherence (e.g., GDPR, PCI DSS, HIPAA).
  • Collaborate with enterprise architecture, security, DevOps, application, and network teams to ensure cohesive infrastructure delivery.
  • Drive continuous improvement initiatives aimed at infrastructure scalability, automation, performance, and cost optimization.
  • Support pre-sales activities, including RFP/RFI responses, solution design, cost estimations, and client workshops.
  • Evaluate and manage partnerships with cloud providers, OEMs, and technology vendors to validate solution feasibility, strengthen service capabilities, and drive aligned GTM.
  • Develop and maintain technical documentation, accelerators, frameworks, and solution blueprints.

Preferred Skills

  • 15+ years of professional experience in IT infrastructure design, implementation, and operations, including 5+ years focused on cloud and data center architecture.
  • Proven track record in enterprise cloud migration projects, hybrid cloud strategy execution, and digital transformation initiatives.
  • Strong expertise in public cloud platforms, designing solutions using native services for compute, storage, networking, identity, security, and automation.
  • Strong background in data center technologies, including virtualization (VMware, Hyper-V), storage systems, network architecture, and infrastructure security.
  • Solid knowledge of containerization and orchestration (Docker, Kubernetes/OpenShift) supporting infrastructure modernization.
  • Strong understanding of IaC and automation tools such as Terraform, Ansible, CloudFormation, ARM Templates.
  • Demonstrated expertise in security architecture and compliance, including identity management, network segmentation, and data protection.
  • Strong consulting and client engagement capabilities, assessments, solution presentations, and executive discussions.
  • Experience with enterprise monitoring, logging, and observability tools (Splunk, Prometheus, Grafana, New Relic).
  • Strong analytical skills with experience in cost assessment, TCO analysis, and infrastructure optimization for cloud and data centers.
  • Good experience in pre-sales, solution design, RFP responses, and deal support.

Application Instructions

Interested candidates may forward their detailed resumes to Careers@reflectionsinfos.com along with their notice period, current, and expected CTC details.

Important Notice: Reflections Info Systems does not charge any fees for job applications. All communications are conducted through the official website or LinkedIn. For any clarification or alerts, contact Careers@reflectionsinfos.com.
summary: Lead enterprise cloud and on-premise infrastructure strategies with 15+ years of experience in cloud architecture, security governance, and hybrid migration. Expertise in public cloud platforms and automation tools.

Brief Description

We're seeking enthusiastic individuals who grew up with technology and are passionate about helping others succeed with it. If you're someone who naturally becomes the "go-to tech person" among friends and family, enjoys explaining how things work, and gets satisfaction from solving puzzles—this role could be perfect for you.

What You'll Do

  • Be the friendly voice that helps healthcare providers and their teams make the most of our platform
  • Investigate and resolve questions about product features through conversations, emails, and support tickets
  • Create helpful content—write support articles, record tutorial videos, and build guides that make complex features easy to understand
  • Work alongside our product and technical teams to understand customer needs and improve our platform
  • Learn the ins and outs of digital healthcare technology, including how clinics, hospitals, and healthcare providers use our tools

What We're Looking For

  • Digital fluency: You're comfortable navigating apps (mobile and web), exploring new features without hesitation, and learning software quickly
  • Communication skills: You can explain technical concepts in simple terms, both in writing and conversation. You enjoy teaching others and have patience when someone doesn't understand something the first time
  • Problem-solving mindset: When something doesn't work, you enjoy figuring out why. You ask good questions and think through possibilities systematically
  • Curiosity: You genuinely want to understand how things work and aren't satisfied with surface-level knowledge
  • Customer empathy: You care about making people's experience better and take pride in helping them succeed
  • Self-motivation: You don't wait to be told what to do—you see what needs attention and take initiative
  • Adaptability: You're comfortable with change and can switch between different types of tasks throughout the day

Preferred Skills

  • Comfortable creating and editing content (articles, documents, presentations)
  • Experience making videos or screen recordings (even casual ones for friends/social media)
  • Good attention to detail—you notice when something is off
  • Basic understanding of how databases, APIs, or web services work (not mandatory, but helpful)
  • Interest in healthcare, wellness, or making a social impact

What You'll Gain

  • Deep knowledge of B2B SaaS operations and healthcare technology
  • Hands-on experience with product support, customer success, and technical communication
  • Mentorship from experienced team members who will invest in your growth
  • Exposure to real-world problem-solving with a global user base
  • A foundation for growth into product management, customer success, or technical roles

Why ContinuousCare?

You'll work at the intersection of healthcare and technology, supporting a platform that genuinely improves patient care and healthcare delivery. We value fresh perspectives, encourage learning, and believe great attitudes and genuine curiosity matter more than prior experience.

To apply, email your resume and a brief note about yourself to: jobs@needstreet.com Note: This role requires you to work from the office. Location – Technopark, Trivandrum.

job_description:
About Us

Way.com — America’s dominant automotive super app, powering every mile for over 10 million customers—from auto insurance and parking to EV charging and more. Leveraging cutting-edge AI, machine learning, and advanced data analytics, we deliver innovative, personalized solutions that transform car ownership. Featured by Bloomberg and ranked 48th on Andreessen Horowitz’s Marketplace list of fastest-growing companies worldwide and recognized as the top Product in Insurance by UnitQ, we’re making car ownership easier, more affordable, and more rewarding.

Role Overview

We are seeking a motivated Junior QA Engineer with 1–2 years of experience in manual and automation testing of web and mobile applications. The ideal candidate will have a strong foundation in manual testing techniques such as functional, regression, sanity, and exploratory testing, along with practical exposure to test automation using tools like Selenium, Playwright, Cypress, or similar frameworks.

Key Responsibilities

  • Hands-on experience testing web applications and mobile apps
  • Strong understanding of manual testing (functional, regression, sanity, exploratory)
  • Practical experience in test automation (Selenium / Playwright / Cypress or similar)
  • Ability to design test cases from requirements and identify edge cases
  • Defect logging, tracking, and validation using Jira or equivalent
  • Ability to analyze failures and distinguish between automation issues and product defects
  • Exposure to logging, monitoring, and production issue validation
  • Willingness to learn and adapt to evolving QA practices, tools, and processes

Preferred Skills

  • Working knowledge of at least one programming language (Java / JavaScript / TypeScript / Python)
  • Basic knowledge of Git/version control
  • Familiarity with cross-browser and cross-device testing
  • Exposure to API testing (Postman, REST basics)
  • Understanding of SDLC, STLC, and Agile/Scrum processes

Nice to Have

  • Database testing knowledge (basic SQL queries, data validation, CRUD operations)
  • Exposure to CI/CD pipelines (Jenkins, GitHub Actions, GitLab CI)
  • Familiarity with test management tools (TestRail or similar)
  • Basic understanding of performance, security, or accessibility testing

Why You Will Love Working With Us

  • Opportunity to work for the #1 Auto Super app in the US.
  • Opportunity to make a meaningful impact across 10+ million users.
  • Dynamic, fast-paced, and innovation-driven work culture.
  • Clear pathways for career growth in a rapidly scaling technology company.
  • Competitive compensation.

Application Details

  • Work Arrangement: On-site
  • Employment Type: Full-time
  • Experience: 1–2 years
  • Contact Email: careers@way.com
  • Apply Now: https://waydot.greythr.com/hire/jobs/junior-qa-engineer
summary: Junior QA Engineer with 1-2 years of experience in manual and automation testing for web and mobile apps. Focus on functional testing, automation frameworks, and defect tracking at a leading US automotive super app.
